availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Covington, Kentucky, bookkeeper. Essex County, Massachusetts, native. Married to Sophia Edson Sargent in Pennsylvania on July 12, 1838. Father of Harvey B. Sargent, Henry Sargent, and George Sargent. Lumber merchant in Covington, Kentucky, in 1850. Bookkeeper in Covington in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington Ward 2, p. 241A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington Ward 5, p. 715.
"Laid to Rest," The Aurora Sun (Aurora, Nebraska), March 30, 1889, p. 5.
